Text:
What a smooth album true butter in your mouth stuff. I hope she has the steam to keep up this level of music!

Thanks for the upload awesome stuff!

For quality encoding, CD's should be encoded at 44.1 @ 256/320 CBR Stereo

VBR is only used for broadcasting or streaming
Joint Stereo is not true stereo and destroys the audio quality.

If you do not believe me, read the standard or at least the wiki pages.
thanks; this is lot better than I'd expected....once you get over the Karen Carpenter stuff; shes a cracking singer
